channel.title: CVE Feed for Meks -- Meks Smart Author Widget

item.title: CVE-2024-37958|2024-07-20T08:11:08.046Z -- meks -- meks%20smart%20author%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Meks Meks Smart Author Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Meks Smart Author Widget: from n/a through 1.1.4.
